#id=1
#text=I recently was able to enjoy the privilege of riding a train .
#id=2
#text=My friend and I had quite a distance to travel .
#id=3
#text=After some discuss with several option we decided to take a train to our destination .
#id=4
#text=We found out where the train station was located and found the window to buy a ticket to our destination .
#id=5
#text=We had our choice of coaches but we chose the cheapest one which meant hard seats that do not recline , no air or food offered in our car section .
#id=6
#text=I had no idea that it would take 14 hours to travel to our destination .
#id=7
#text=It really felt like a lifetime , especially when you can not get comfortable and find a position to relax .
#id=8
#text=We tried several ways of resting but after a few minutes we would get up and reposition ourselves .
#id=9
#text=The ride was nice overall though because the conductor would stop every four hours or so to allow for bathroom breaks and food purchases at the stops .

#text=We took the night train so the majority of the time we would not able to enjoy the view out of the window but when daylight broke and we were able to see outside it made the trip go by quicker .
#text=So , overall I have to say that it was a very good experience and cheap too .
